description: This mod adds the following animals to randomly spawn:Cows (Spawns on grass soil), Cats (Spawns on forest soil), Turtles (Spawns on Sand, aka beaches), Crabs (Spawns on Sand, aka beaches), Penguins (Spawns on Forest Frozen Soil)
